Setting links after installation

We recommend setting two links after building the Heterogeneous Updateable Toolkit. One makes the toolkit easily updateable; the other makes the tools available in a heterogeneous network environment. Note: If you choose not to set the links in place, you must set your PATH according to the value you choose for exec-prefix.
